#| echo: false

library(leaflet)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(hms)

rm(list = ls())
options(digits.secs=9)

##############################################################################################################
##############################################################################################################

lokace <- "C:/Users/Mr. Spock/Documents/GitHub/eitcourse/"                                       #Základní lokace, kde budou umístěny složky s vyhodnocením
csv <- ".csv"
soubor <- "B1D2_Relace-pro-hodnoceni-Tlim"
cesta <- paste(lokace,"/",soubor,csv,sep = "")

data <- read.csv(cesta, sep = ";", encoding = "UTF-8")
med <- as.numeric(data[268,4])
Tlim <- as.numeric(data[270,4])
medhod <- round(med/60,1)
medp <- paste("median =",as.character(medhod),"min         ")
Tlimhod <- round(Tlim/60,1)
Tlimp <- paste("Tlim =",as.character(Tlimhod),"min         ")

i <- 30
j <- as.numeric(round(length(data$CasovyRozdil..s.[1:267])/i))

data$CasProfil1a <- NA
data$CasProfil1a[1:267] <- parse_hms(data$CasProfil1[1:267])
data$CasProfil1a <- as_hms(data$CasProfil1a)

osaX <- hms::as_hms(seq(as.numeric(hms::hms(hours = 8, minutes = 10)), as.numeric(hms::hms(hours = 9, minutes = 10)), by = as.numeric(hms::hms(minutes = 5 ))))

##Tvorba grafů, výpočet a uložení mediánu a T_lim
nazev <- "Time difference of pairs of records"
 
  
  graf <- ggplot(data[1:267,], aes(x = CasProfil1a[1:267] ,y=as.numeric(CasovyRozdil..s.[1:267]))) + geom_point(shape=3, color = "gray45") +
    ggtitle(nazev) +
    labs(x="Record time in first measuring profile [HH:MM:SS]", y="Time difference [s]") +
    scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = 0, add = 0), limits = c(0,350),breaks = c((seq(0, 350, by = 50)), med, Tlim), labels = c((seq(0, 350, by = 50)), medp, Tlimp))+ 
    scale_x_time(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.1,0.12), add = 0), breaks = osaX)+
    theme_light()+
    theme(
      panel.border =  element_rect(linetype = "solid", fill = NA, color = "gray80"),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = "gray80"),
      panel.grid.minor = element_line(colour="transparent"),
      plot.title=element_text(size=14, lineheight=1, color= 1, hjust=0.5),
      axis.title.x=element_text(color=1, margin = margin(t = 10)),
      axis.text.x=element_text(color="black",angle = 90, vjust = 0.5),
      axis.title.y=element_text(color=1))+
    geom_hline(yintercept=as.numeric(med),linetype = "longdash",color = "black", linewidth = 1 )+
    geom_hline(yintercept=as.numeric(Tlim),linetype = "longdash",color = "black", linewidth = 1 )

 
  print(graf)
